You help decide the strategy of Smart Justice in Reno County.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Last month, we hosted an inaugural Kansans for Smart Justice Lobby Day in Topeka. Although we faced a very tough legislature, 75 activists from across the state showed up and allowed their voices to be heard.

We’re not done yet. Our goal is to ensure that all elected officials in the state of Kansas think responsibly and critically regarding Smart Justice Reform. You may be familiar with our efforts focused on prosecutorial accountability. This year, we plan to double down on those efforts.

Join us for the Smart Justice Team Meeting in your county to learn about our prosecutorial accountability efforts.

Reno County Smart Justice Strategy Meeting

Learn about holding the Reno county prosecutor accountable.

Thursday, April 18, 6:30 p.m.
Hutchinson Public Library
901 N Main St.

Bring your voice to our Reno County Smart Justice Strategy meeting on Thursday, April 18. We’re in this fight together, and cannot wait to see you.

Stronger together,

Kiana Knolland
Field Organizer for Smart Justice, ACLU of Kansas
